description: Number of solutions to x^3 == 0 (mod n).
comments: Shadow transform of the cubes A000578. - _Michel Marcus_, Jun 06 2013
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
S. R. Finch and Pascal Sebah, Squares and Cubes Modulo n (arXiv:math.NT/0604465).
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^[2e/3]. - _David W. Wilson_, Aug 01 2001
mathematica: Array[ Function[ n, Count[ Array[ PowerMod[ #, 3, n ]&, n, 0 ], 0 ] ], 100 ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
